Don't Panic

Testing Prose-io

This is just a testing

I have just found this prose.io website for online editing GitPage Blog, this is just a post for testing.

Pretty cool, it supports the emacs key-binding!

Work with Jekyll

For the Jekyll blog, you need manully add a line

layout: post

at the meta part? Haven’t found any other good solution.
